name: Angels on Tanks
description:
• Take command and lead your troops on a turn-based war full of Strategy and Tanks.
  • Unlock up to 97 Officers and Commanders, each one with their own Special Power and sexy style.
  • More than 40 Hours of gameplay in tons of missions on Campaign Mode: Winter's Blood, Eastern Coalition, Free Nations and UDF factions will battle for the final Victory.









Your army is comprised of the toughest and the most stunning female Captains, Lieutenants, and Sergeants. Ready to fight under your command, their loyalty increases as you win battles. Rank them up to develop their skills, and take them to new heights. Then construct your ultimate battle deck!









Take command of up to 14 troop types including a wide range of military forces, from Rocket Artillery and Motorbikes to Bombers and Helicopters. All your troops have unique abilities and level up the more they fight.










Angels On Tanks conflict shifts when the army of Winter’s Blood are power hungry and have a devious plan for the newly discovered super powerful Crystals that can create an indestructible army. Take to the battlefield and use advanced war strategies, weapons, and tactics to decimate your opponent.
